fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
> Sniff an authorized target, learning their faction.

> Play with an authorized target, roleblocking them.

> Guard an authorized target, giving them powerful defense.

> Guide an authorized target, stopping anything that would prevent their ability from being used (this won't make killers kill through protection).

> Bite an authorized target, dealing a basic attack to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
> All of your abilities have one use.

> Whenever a Sentry (Power) dies, gain a use for 2 of your abilities. You pick which abilities you gain a use for. You cannot gain an extra use of Bite.
